Posts.Content: I'm due to start my 1st chemotherapy treatment next Friday and have come down with a cold today, does anyone know if you can still get treatment? I'm due to get a phone call on Tuesday from chemo nurse to check im still ok before I start but not sure if i should call them on Monday first?
Posts.Title: Having a cold before chemo

Posts.Content: Thank you for the reply. IÂ  i will wait until tues and tell them, hoping it's gone by next friday and can get the treatment as don't want more delays....still very nervous and scared
Posts.Title: Having a cold before chemo
